fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34887].
  {panel}

Dear, 

I created some content pages with others labels. And then in the page I used macro Content By Label with theses labels so result are not pages. 
Please help me to fix this. 
Before It works normally , now there is error. Now is near the day we must publish confluence in company. 
Please see the attachments.
fields.summary: Macro Content By Label is not working
Permanent link to a version of a Confluence page when the page is the current page
Clicking 'older' in  'View Recent Blog Posts' causes an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException when switching to previous month
Allow customization of main nav bar captions

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34874].
  {panel}

The page restrictions should be extended to manage anonymous access.

Example:
# Create group A and group B
# Create user A and user B
# Add user A into group A and user B into group B
# Create a page called testing
# Restrict viewing to group A and to anonymous
# User from group A can see the page
# Anonymous can also see the page.
fields.summary: Ability to grant anonymous access in page restrictions

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34869].
  {panel}

Thanks for Newcode Macro plugin.
This is not a bug but a improve request.

Please locate Expand/Collapse link of new code macro on the left side to improve usability.

h4. Situation / Reproduce

- A user works with wide screen (display).
- If user want to expand the code brock on the page, need to move scroll bar to find the expand link.

It's convenient, if the expand link locates on the left side, near the code title.
Or hope to toggle show / hide with double click action on the code brock's title bar.   
Please see attachment images.

I tried to customize confluence CSS to locate expand/collapse link on the left side, but I hope to improve this NewCode Macro itself.

Sincerely.
fields.summary: Locate Expand/Collapse link on the left side to improve usability
User picker and date picker  do not show on the dialog
Highlight additions/removals for description changes in issue history

When font color is changed to a standard font in all instances of that color, PPT loads.
fields.summary: Use of Specific Colors in PowerPoint Presentations throws NPE

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34861].
  {panel}

When you edit an issue's description on the task's page (eg. https://project.atlassian.net/browse/ID-001) and you want to save your changes, so you press Ctrl+S which brings up the save dialog in the latest Chrome. Ok, that's not you wanted, so you press the Escape button and you've lost your changes. It's very counterintuitive.

Suggestions:
  - map Ctrl+S to save changes
  - or if the user made changes don't discard them without any warning
  - (not prefered) or somehow block save dialog Esc to discard the changes
fields.summary: Issue editing, Ctrl+S brings up save dialog then Esc discards the changes
Support adding items to the info banner when using documentation theme
Extra menu entries should get some icons for better UI guidance
Preview in the editor should show a more specific error for 403 response
Attachment macro filter doesn't affect download all
Gallery Macro Should have Tag Feature
Firefox mobile browser support
Edit Task from any page

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34844].
  {panel}

In JIRA, there is an option to update the SMTP timeout through the UI.  We would like to see this option in Confluence as well.  

After logging in as and Administrator, under the 'Mail Servers' menu, select the option to 'Edit Mail Servers.'  There should be an option to set the number of milliseconds for timeout in this list.

There is a workaround, which involves updating the BANDANA Table, and can be found here: [SMTP Timeout|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONFKB/How+To+Set+the+Confluence+SMTP+Timeout]

This issue relates to the following: 
https://support.atlassian.com/browse/CSP-130319
https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONF-29033

Please note - When the mail settings are updated in any way, the workaround has to be re-executed.  Any changes causes the settings to revert to the default.
fields.summary: Set the Confluence SMTP Timeout Through the UI

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34842].
  {panel}

Dear support, 

After looking over the documentation provided to your software I was not able to find a reasonable solution to my issue. 
I would call it a bug, but more of a flexibility requirement. 
The matter is based on a workaround i cannot seem to find. 
In the process of developing a step-by-step implementation guide, I must create a numbered sub-guide in a numbered list. 
The reason for the numbering within the list is due to the fact of the sub-guide being located on a separate page with appropriate numbering on screenshots, which is later included in a numbered list with the aid of the Expand Macro.

Now the main issue i am facing is that I am not able to create single nor page specific screenshots with numbered steps for my solution.
The only possible resolution to the obstacle that i have found is to place the contents of the include page into the expand macro and leave it out from the hierarchy.
fields.summary: Force Numbered Lists

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34841].
  {panel}

Current squad:

Brazil support 
Jorge Dias
Rodrigo Adami   
Guilherme Nedel 
Giuliano de Campos 
William Zanchet 
Deividi Luvison 
Eduardo Mallmann
Renato Rudnicki
fields.summary: Update Confluence Brazil team members on release notes

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34840].
  {panel}

Love the new Task List features in 5.5.4!  Using Due Dates, using the Task Report Blueprint (multiple views with different labels).  The features are certainly helping my team's productivity!

One thing that is missing (for me) is the ability to prioritize.

Use case: I have a member of my team that has been pulled off onto a fire drill project.  She has a backlog of tasks building up in Confluence and some truly are more urgent than others.  I have no way to prioritize these outside of utilizing some type of SOP in the task description (yuck!).

Implementation suggestion: While I would love to prioritize by drag and drop (a la Jira Agile), I fully understand this can be a bit misleading with all of the different task view - my tasks, my assigned tasks, this task report, that task report, etc.  Perhaps something like how Due Date is implemented?  Some prescribed keystroke to pull up a pre-set set list of priorities (H, M, L) or 1-10 or something.

Thanks!
fields.summary: Task List: Ability to prioritize tasks
Add the ability to comment a task (especially when setting it "completed")
Loading comments asynchronously

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34837].
  {panel}

Since Confluence version 5.6, comments are sent in the background with Ajax and there won't be any page reloads when comments are sent. I think this feature was overdue - thanks for the implementation!

In my opinion, the next step would be to push comments directly to other users such that those don't have to reload the page to see new comments. With the increasing presence of WebSocket, the technical base would be given for this feature.

My question: can we expect this feature in the medium term? Or am I totally on the wrong track with this idea?

(Taken from: https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/332109/pushing-comments-to-clients-websockets-for-comments)
fields.summary: Pushing comments to clients with WebSockets

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34835].
  {panel}

The attached files become unavailable after moving a blog post to another space.

How to repro:
# Create a blog post and attach 1 or more files on it (seems better to use non-image files for reproduction)
# Move the blog post to another space
# Confirm the attached are no longer available (May needs removing your browser's cache)

FYI, I found the following error and warning logs were added to attassian-confluence.log when I copied the blog post. test.txt is the name of the attached file in the log.
{code}
2014-09-05 02:10:10,024 ERROR [scheduler_Worker-10] [atlassian.confluence.pages.DefaultAttachmentManager] getAttachmentData Could not find data for attachment: Attachment: test.txt v.1 (884740) admin - com.atlassian.confluence.pages.persistence.dao.filesystem.AttachmentDataFileSystemException: No such file for Attachment: test.txt v.1 (884740) admin
2014-09-05 02:10:10,026 WARN [scheduler_Worker-10] [bonnie.search.extractor.BaseAttachmentContentExtractor] addFields Encountered attachment with null stream: test.txt
2014-09-05 02:10:10,031 ERROR [scheduler_Worker-10] [atlassian.confluence.pages.DefaultAttachmentManager] getAttachmentData Could not find data for attachment: Attachment: test.txt v.1 (884740) admin - com.atlassian.confluence.pages.persistence.dao.filesystem.AttachmentDataFileSystemException: No such file for Attachment: test.txt v.1 (884740) admin
2014-09-05 02:10:10,032 WARN [scheduler_Worker-10] [bonnie.search.extractor.BaseAttachmentContentExtractor] addFields Encountered attachment with null stream: test.txt
{code}

Would you fix it if you confirm it is a bug, please? Also, please share with us if there is a way to work it around.
fields.summary: The attached become unavailable after moving a blog post to another space
there should be an option to scale image at 1:1 ratio when using file preview
Add Label dialog: Keep the focus on the text box after adding a label

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34830].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
The {{Page Property}} macro is not displaying new pages that include specified labels

h3. Environment
Cloud

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create parent page
# Setup {{Page Property}} macro to look for specific labels
# Create a child page and tag it with one of these labels

h3. Expected Results
New child page will show up in the macro

h3. Actual Results
Page does not actually show up
fields.summary: Page Properties Macro not working

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34824].
  {panel}

h2. Problem Summary
*Main issue:* When the Base URL of Confluence is changed, the some URLs in the Workbox notification tray will still show the old URL until Confluence is restarted.

*Secondary issue:* Furthermore, there is inconsistent behavior between the different links in the Workbox. If you receive a notification in Workbox that includes a link to a Confluence Page, or a link to a comment on a Page, it will use absolute links (which is building off of the old base URL) while all other links (Reply, Like, Stop Watching, etc) use relative links (built based on the _current URL_ being accessed)

h2. Example of discrepancy between links
An absolute link
!absolutelink.png|thumbnail!
A relative link
!relativelink.png|thumbnail!

h2. Reproduction steps:
# Receive a notification and note the URL of the "Open" link
# Change the base URL to something else
# View the notification tray and check the "Open" link again

h2. Expected behavior
All of the links should have been updated to use the new base URL, *or* all should be using the relative URL. That is, there should be consistency

h2. Actual behavior
Some links use relative links while others use absolute links (such as "Open") that still point to the old URL

h2. Workaround
Restarting Confluence will rebuild the absolute links to use the new Base URL. If you are on Confluence Data Center, you will need to make sure all nodes are shut down, then start each back up (that is, do not do a rolling restart).

This will address the new base URL issue, however it does not address the consistency issue.
fields.summary: Links in Workbox Notifications Not Consistent and Not Updated after Changing Base URL

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34816].
  {panel}

I’ve seen this recently with Confluence:
 
1. Authenticate to confluence
2. View/edit docs or whatever
3. Don’t use confluence for a while so that your session times out
4. Try to search for  something with the timed out session.  You will get prompted for your username/password
5. Once authenticated, the search string you entered is ignored and 114, 976 results are returned.
 
Either confluence should honor the search entered, or just take you to your home space, and not return a list of all the docs in confluence.
fields.summary: Searching lost when confluence session has timed out

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34814].
  {panel}

Currently user can only configure page in the same space as their home page.

The user should be allow to configure pages from a different spaces their homepage. This feature will be useful if the customer who want the same home spaces for all their spaces. With this feature, they do not need to copy the content of a pages to all their spaces.


Here's an example of a scenario on how this feature work:
# There are three  spaces A , B and C
# There is a page  P1 from space A
#  There should be a feature to allow the P1 to be configure as home page for  Space A , B and C.
fields.summary: Ability to configure same home page for different space.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34811].
  {panel}

h4. Steps to Reproduce:

1. Create a User in Confluence with Following Details:
|Username|a|
|Full Name|A B|

2. Use {{@mention}} to tag user _a_ with the username.

h4. Actual Result:

It's not possible to use @mention to search for this user.

h4. Expected Result:

Username must be appear on the list of suggestions.

h4. Improvement Request:

It'd be good to allow users with one letter in first name, last name and username to use @mention functionality. At the meantime only users with the more than one letter in username or users with more than one letters in their name can be use this feature.
fields.summary: Allow users with one letter in username to use @mention functionality

However, we think the thing of dependencySources directory.

  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34794].
  {panel}

Use case:
- create an Office Excel spreadsheet  that contains urls to internal Confluence site pages  
- insert the spreadsheet within a Confluence page using the Office Excel macro
- the hyperlinks to internal Confluence site pages are somehow modified by the plugin and will no longer resolve to the desired address. The displayed url text remains the same, but the plugin is removing the "/confluence" element from the actual url. When clicking on the links, they take you to pages that have no "/confluence" in the url, causing the links not to resolve.
fields.summary: Office Excel macro modifies and brakes links in the spreadsheet

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34793].
  {panel}

h3. Note

This error message is the catch-all exception for the JIRA Issues Macro, so there are a number of possible causes for this. The below example is one way of triggering the problem. Another known cause is the response from JIRA taking too long and exceeding the timeouts in Confluence. If you suspect this is the case in your instance, please refer to [this KB article|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONFKB/Timeouts+in+the+JIRA+Issues+Macro+or+Highlighting+Plugin] for more information.

If you run into this problem, please add the following packages to *Confluence Admin > Logging and Profiling* and set them to DEBUG level logging:
* com.atlassian.confluence.extra.jira
* com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.JIRA

Having done so, please create a ticket at http://support.atlassian.com/ and attach a Support Zip with this extra logging. 

h3. Steps to reproduce

# Add many JIRA issue links on a Confluence page. Try 30.
# Save the page

h3. Expected Results

The JIRA issue links display fine with summary, status, etc.

h3. Actual Results

Confluence displays an error message for each JIRA issue link:

bq. JIRA Issues Macro: Data cannot be retrieved due to an unexpected error

h3. More info

Confluence logs show:

{code}
2014-09-03 06:42:40.601459500 2014-09-03 06:42:40,596 ERROR [TP-Processor127] [extra.jira.util.JiraUtil] checkForErrors Received HTTP 413 from server. Error message: Request Entity Too Large
2014-09-03 06:42:40.601462500  -- url: /wiki/display/KEY/My+Page | page: 1234567 | userName: myname | action: viewpage
{code}
fields.summary: JIRA Issues Macro returns "Data cannot be retrieved due to an unexpected error"

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34772].
  {panel}

Word has a useful basic shapes and call out feature set where you can quickly draw coloured outlined circles and other shapes around important parts of a document and to clarify points with a call out text box and arrow.

It would be great if Confluence could have such a feature under the edit menu to highlight words, paragraphs and parts of embedded images with coloured out lines, of various shapes and sizes and call out text boxes.

One example would be when creating work instructions using screen shots and having a convenient way to highlight parts of a screenshot without having to go to Word to make the changes.

I know this starts to go towards a drawing package but I think even if it was kept basic it would be extremely useful.
fields.summary: Call out and Highlight Shapes for Confluence

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34771].
  {panel}

Embedded graphics in confluence have a handy resize feature where images can be displayed at a smaller size and then clicked on by the user to reveal the full image. This is perfect for saving screen real estate or when trying to keep the flow of a document from being interrupted by large images.

1) It would be good to have  a "apply to all images on page" tick box  when selecting a display size while in page edit mode.

2) It would be handy to have an option to display a message "click for full image" under such resized images. Maybe as a choice for a default behaviour.

3) Under the Word and PDF Export options to have a tick box to print all images as large or full size because minimised images are of no use in such document types.
fields.summary: Image size options when displaying in Confluence and Word/PDF export

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34751].
  {panel}

h5.Steps to Reproduce
# Create a new Space
# Export the Space as XML
# Delete the Space you just created
# Import the Space Export
# On a page, create the Task Report Macro, and point it at the imported space.

h5.Expected Result
The Task Report Macro should show the tasks that are incomplete, or complete (depending on the settings). Using this example, the report should show 4 incomplete tasks (from the default home page)

h5.Actual Result
The Task Report Macro doesn't show the tasks that are incomplete. Marking a task as complete and then incomplete doesn't show the task either.

The task does not appear in the database. 

h5.Workaround 
None so far.
fields.summary: Importing an XML Export does not create inline tasks and comments correctly

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34721].
  {panel}

First time in Jira - apologies if I'm in the wrong place.

I think the 'Additional Instructions' field on the Destinations page in Delivery on A5 could confuse clients. A simple change - changing the text from 'Additional Instructions' to 'Additional Instructions to Adstream' - would make it foolproof. 

I had to check myself whether this fed through to the Broadcaster interface (and so was somewhere for clients to write instructions for the Broadcaster) or whether it only fed through to Adstream Traffic (and was intended for instructions only for them). 

If a client believes it feeds through to Broadcasters, we could get stuck if they enter an important instruction in good faith and we miss passing it on to the Broadcaster or flagging to the client that the Broadcaster won't see the comment  and they'll need to contact them themselves. 



Thanks,

Charlotte
fields.summary: A5 Delivery - Destinations Page - 'Additional Instructions' Field

Images that are set to center align is not reflected in the Confluence page. However, if the page is exported to PDF the images are displayed correctly (center).

h3. ***Steps to reproduce the issue***

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34701].
  {panel}

It'd be good to improve the @Mentions functionality to work with the first letter of the first name or family name. In Japan, there are many users with just one letter as First Name and Last Name. Unfortunately, user with one letter as First Name and Last Name is not listed on suggestions of the @Mentions.

*Steps to Reproduce*

1. Create a user with one letter as First Name and Last Name.

|Username|ab|
|FullName|A B|

2. In the editor, type '@' then "a" as the user's First Name or type '@' then "a b".

*Actual Result*

The user's name does not appear on the list of suggestions.
So a user with one letter as First Name and Last Name cannot be chosen from the suggestions list.

*Workaround*

It's possible to find the user with the username rather than the name.

_Example:_
Type '@' then "ab".
fields.summary: Improve the @Mentions to work with the first letter of the name

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
*NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34661].
----
*Atlassian Update: September 16, 2021*
Hi Confluence Cloud customers,

Exciting news, we’ve been making some improvements to Search Analytics in Confluence! This analytics feature is available for our Premium edition users. Here you’ll be able to see details about search terms including their click through rate, total number of searches and number of individual users who are looking for that query, with more functionality coming soon! We’re thrilled to finally close out this long-lived ticket! 

Documentation for this is available here: [https://support.atlassian.com/confluence-cloud/docs/view-insights-on-your-site/|https://community.atlassian.com/t5/Confluence-articles/Copy-a-hierarchy-of-pages-in-Confluence-Cloud/ba-p/1439350]

Thank you again for persisting with us on this feature suggestion and for sharing your feedback. For any further improvement suggestions that haven’t been addressed in this change, please open a new ticket so that we can gauge interest and feedback for each request.

Best,
Emily Ditchfield
Product Manager, Confluence Cloud
{panel}
I would like to see what words are used the most in the search-bar.
 It could be embedded to _Lucene_.
fields.summary: Record and List the most popular search terms in Confluence
Automatically Move Completed Task from "Incomplete Task" list

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34655].
  {panel}

h3. Steps to reproduce:

# Download [this|https://jira.atlassian.com/secure/attachment/125818/TESTS-TestSuites.xml] report. _(If you open the file, you see that we have at least *one* failure)_
# Create a page, and add his file as attachment.
# Go to this page and add the JUnit macro and add the URL like this:
{code}
file:///blah.atlassian.net/wiki/download/attachments/42729495/junit.xml
{code}
# You'll see that it won't render any results.

!https://s3.amazonaws.com/uploads.hipchat.com/10804/681827/4IcVgVUPvTr5mNL/Screen%20Shot%202014-08-22%20at%2011.15.03%20AM.png!

h3. Workaround:
There's no workaround
fields.summary: JUnit macro doesn't render results from a JUnit XML report.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34654].
  {panel}

Exactly the same request as CONF-25638, but with different reasons.

I find renaming images really confusing and unpleasent user experience, mainly from this scenario:
# When editing a page with lots of clipboard pasted images.
# I pasted lots of images.
# Now i want to rename the pictures properly for easy referencing.
# Went to the attachments of the page, not so good looking.
# Started to rename files, and I need to tab-shift back and forth with different tabs just to preview the images so i don't rename them wrongly.

This is absolutely madness if i need to do this even once a day or a few times a week.

Please, include the thumbnail of the image some where in the property of the attachment if it is a image type.
fields.summary: Display image thumbnail (preview) in Image Properties page for easy renaming user experience

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-34653].
  {panel}

When you are on a confluence page. ( Read only mode )
You scroll down until the end of the page and then you would have to scroll all the way up again to press edit. This can be avoided by using the shortcut key: ' E ' .

Current:
When you are at the bottom of the page and press 'E' to edit, you fly all the way up to the top of the page again.

Expected: 
When I press ' E ' at the bottom of the page, I want to stay at the same level / spot on the page in edit mode.


Kind regards
Kristof
fields.summary: Pressing 'E' to edit a page, stay on the same page lvl
Toggle update personal space name during user full name change
